## Magnifyr

<!-- Travis badge -->
[![Travis-CI Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/luishusier/magnifyr.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/luishusier/magnifyr)

The `magnifyr` package implements random vectors and associated
inferential techniques in R. Get started with:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(magnifyr)

x <- beta(1:10, 10:1)
mean(x)
draw(x)
```
